definition: camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to scoop the best camera shots/to grab the limelight

sentences.english: They also take into consideration the difficulty of the shot.
sentences.chinese: 鏡頭的易度果豔也會斟酌在內。

sentences.english: There are many meaningful long scenes in this director's films.
sentences.chinese: 這位導演的影片中有很多意味深長的長鏡頭。

sentences.english: Back on Earth, in a wordless montage, Batman goes to see Vixen.
sentences.chinese: 無聲的蒙太奇鏡頭閃回了地球，蝙蝠俠去看維克森。

sentences.english: Our Super-Secret Spy Lens is the answer.
sentences.chinese: 這就是這個鏡頭的奧祕之處了。

sentences.english: Not very nice , goof lens and more.
sentences.chinese: 不怎麼好看，穿幫鏡頭多。

sentences.english: Some close-ups of cadets and instructors.
sentences.chinese: 以下是學員和指導員的特寫鏡頭。

sentences.english: With direction index, sapphire cover lens, never abrasion.
sentences.chinese: 帶有方向標，藍寶石鏡頭，永不磨損。

sentences.english: The three-axis lens mount allows for either wall or ceiling installation.
sentences.chinese: 三軸鏡頭支架能讓攝像機安裝在牆上或者天花板上。

sentences.english: Most of the images are taken with micro techniques and lens to be able to shot these great shots.
sentences.chinese: 大多數技術和鏡頭都能夠拍攝這些精彩畫面。

sentences.english: Most singers are good at posing in front of cameras.
sentences.chinese: 大部份歌手都很擅長在鏡頭前擺姿勢。

sentences.english: Which is sort of a childhood nursery rhyme. And then they cut to this pig and a car with two pin wheels,
sentences.chinese: 這是小時候的兒歌。然後鏡頭切換到豬和有風車的車，

sentences.english: See iReport photos and videos from the scene
sentences.chinese: 從這個鏡頭裏看這個iReport照片和視頻。

sentences.english: All inner scenes are shot inside this car.
sentences.chinese: 所有內部鏡頭均在此車廂內被拍攝。

sentences.english: Different strides of different personalities captured in full-body shots while strolling in Orchard Road.
sentences.chinese: 不同性格不同的進展捕獲全身鏡頭，而在烏節路散步。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
